statement.p: Explain how to find the dimension of W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{\left[\begin{array}{r} -4 \\ -2 \\ -4 \\ -4 \\ -4 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 1 \\ -1 \\ -1 \\ -1 \\ 0 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 12 \\ 6 \\ 12 \\ 12 \\ 12 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 25 \\ 11 \\ 23 \\ 23 \\ 24 \end{array}\right]\right\}.
